bibl.title: Hipponax Narrator. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Versions of this paper were presented at the Oxford Philological Society in February 2007, at "The Archimedes Palimpsest Colloquium" held at the Eötvös Collegium, Budapest, in September and at the University of Belgrade in November. - 1. The listener. - 2. The narrator. - 3. Time. - 4. Repetition.
CAREY Chris, Hipponax Narrator. Avec résumé en anglais.
